org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild

Class JkJavaPacker.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild.JkJavaPacker.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    JkJavaPacker

    public static class JkJavaPacker.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for JkJavaPacker

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JkJavaPacker build()
      Builds the packer.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder doFatJar(java.lang.Boolean doFatJar)
      Set true to generate a fat jar.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder doJar(boolean doJar)
      Set true to generate a jar file containing both classes and resources.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder doSign(java.lang.Boolean doSign, java.io.File secretRingKey, java.lang.String secretKeyPassword)
      Tells the packer to sign each produced element.

      Tells the packer to sign each produced element.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder doSources(java.lang.Boolean doSources)
      Set true to generate a jar file containing sources.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder doTest(java.lang.Boolean doTest)
      Set true to generate a jar file containing both test classes and test sources.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder extraAction(JkJavaPacker.JkExtraPacking jkExtraPacking)
      Add an extra action to the packer to be build.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder extraFilesInJar(JkFileTreeSet files)
      Add extra files to jars that aren't required to be on the project classpath.

      Set a specific filter allowing to exclude some files from the fat jar.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder fatJarSuffix(java.lang.String suffix)
      Gives the suffix that will be appended at the end of the 'normal' jar for naming the fat jar.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder fullName(boolean fullName)
      True means that the name of the archives will include the groupId of the artifact.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder includeVersion(boolean includeVersion)
      True to include the version in the file names.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder md5checksum(boolean checkSum)
      Generate MD-5 check sum for archives.
      JkJavaPacker.Builder sha1checksum(boolean checkSum)
      Generate SHA1 check sum for archives.

        public JkJavaPacker.Builder includeVersion(boolean includeVersion)
        True to include the version in the file names.

        True means that the name of the archives will include the groupId of the artifact.

        Generate MD-5 check sum for archives.

        Generate SHA1 check sum for archives.

        public JkJavaPacker.Builder doJar(boolean doJar)
        Set true to generate a jar file containing both classes and resources.

        public JkJavaPacker.Builder doTest(java.lang.Boolean doTest)

                                   JkPgp pgp)
        Tells the packer to sign each produced element.

      • fatJarSuffix

        public JkJavaPacker.Builder fatJarSuffix(java.lang.String suffix)
        Gives the suffix that will be appended at the end of the 'normal' jar for naming the fat jar. If the name of the normal jar is mylib.jar and the suffix is uber then the fat jar file name will be mylib-uber.jar.

      • doSign

        public JkJavaPacker.Builder doSign(java.lang.Boolean doSign,
                                   java.io.File secretRingKey,
                                   java.lang.String secretKeyPassword)
        Tells the packer to sign each produced element.

      • extraAction

        public JkJavaPacker.Builder extraAction(JkJavaPacker.JkExtraPacking jkExtraPacking)
        Add an extra action to the packer to be build.

      • fatJarExclusionFilter

        public JkJavaPacker.Builder fatJarExclusionFilter(JkPathFilter zipEntryFilter)
        Set a specific filter allowing to exclude some files from the fat jar. By default "meta-inf/*.rsa", "meta-inf/*.dsa", "meta-inf/*.sf" are excluded.

      • extraFilesInJar

        public JkJavaPacker.Builder extraFilesInJar(JkFileTreeSet files)
        Add extra files to jars that aren't required to be on the project classpath. Useful for licenes, readmes, etc.

      • build

        public JkJavaPacker build()
        Builds the packer.
